about_the_game:
HUMANKIND: Music for the Ages albums features hours of traditional music from the game’s soundtrack. Volume 5 includes the 18 new tracks from the DLC “Cultures of Africa”, performed and improvised by several talented artists: Aboubacar Kouyaté - Oumar Camara - Salifou Diarra - Zouregma Barnabé Koala. Produced by Arnaud Roy.

This is a music album for you to listen outside the game / You don’t need this music DLC to have access to the music in the game

18 tracks. 36 mn. Includes MP3 and FLAC files.
